unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: Effects of Degrees of Freedom on the Chi-square Distribution
question_text: Which of the following statements are true? I. A small chi-square value leads to rejecting the null hypothesis. II. The chi-square distribution is nearly normal for very large degrees of freedom. III. If a chi-square value leads to rejecting the null hypothesis with $20$ degrees of freedom it must also lead to rejecting the null hypothesis with $10$ degrees of freedom.
